details.arabic_diacless: اني اعوذ بالرحمٰن منك ان كنت تقيا
details.arabic: اِنِّيْٓ اَعُوۡذُ بِالرَّحۡمٰنِ مِنۡكَ اِنۡ كُنۡتَ تَقِيًّا
details.transliteration: innee aAAoothu birrahmaniminka in kunta taqiyya
details.translations: "Indeed, I seek refuge in the Most Merciful from you, [so leave me], if you should be fearing of Allah ."
